result.eng: Excuse me, are you from the stone age?
result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal an ón chlochaois thú

result.eng: That was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ga: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.orig: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré

result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé sin ar eolas againn ón ḟaisnéis a fuair muid roiṁ réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.

result.eng: We deal with enquiries from the public.

result.eng: He stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ga: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.orig: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud

result.eng: It is two miles away from the house.

result.ponchtml: Tá sé ḋá ṁíle ón teaċIt is two miles away from the house.

result.eng: She was evicted from the house.

result.ponchtml: Díbríoḋ ón teaċ íShe was evicted from the house.

result.eng: Stay away from those people.

result.orig: Fan amach ón dream sin
result.html: Fan amach ón dream sinStay away from those people.
result.ponchtml: Fan amaċ ón dream sinStay away from those people.

result.eng: We got an order from the general.

result.eng: I got a call from the journalist.

result.html: Fuair mé glaoch ón iriseoirI got a call from the journalist.
result.ponchtml: Fuair mé glaoċ ón iriseoirI got a call from the journalist.

result.eng: They got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.

result.eng: From this day on the weather usually worsens.

result.eng: I haven't managed to escape from the meeting.

result.eng: I'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
